Action.author: latitiah
Action.body: This may or may not be covered in the unit tests and integration tests in the NodeSDK and JavaSDK repos.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~wlahti ~mrosen52 ~ales Is there integration test for this now?

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Yes, this functionality is now available in master and is covered in the integration tests. I'll close this item.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Covered by the functionality for CheckCommitReadiness as well as the enhancements to QueryChaincodeDefinition/QueryChaincodeDefinitions.
